title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 104: Featuring Torey Krug
description:
On this week's episode, the guys are joined by Boston Bruins defenseman Torey Krug. The guys talk about what #47 has been up to this summer and how he is rehabbing from his injury at the end of last season. The guys talk everything under the sun with Krug, from Marchand licking people to Cam Neely pretending to be SeaBass. The guys also talk Whit vs Riggs, Grinnelli's bar tab and much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
